s: In any case, I didn't hold Russell Brand in very high regard as someone who should be taken seriously as a comic much less a political critic. His humor seemed manic, tortured and over-compensating and sometimes just mean. He just wasn't funny to me. So, when his name came up in the context ...

s: Today, AWS is a significant revenue driver and a cornerstone of the Amazon story. It powers everything from startup apps to massive online platforms for Fortune 500 companies. By offering scalable, pay-as-you-go cloud services, AWS revolutionized the tech industry.

Amazon raised a series A of $8M from Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers in 1995. In 1997, Amazon went public to raise additional capital. By 1999, the value of the Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers investment in Amazon created returns of over 55,000%.
